Planner plan: 1. Use the device ID 6c645f61-0b82-235f-e476-8a6afc0e73dc to check the current phase of the dish washing cycle.
2. Execute the capability custom.dishwasherOperatingProgress to get the current progress of the dishwashing cycle.
3. Optionally, execute custom.dishwasherOperatingPercentage to get the percentage of the cycle completed.
4. Optionally, execute dishwasherOperatingState to get the current operational state of the dishwasher.
Planner notes: The dishwasher has multiple capabilities that can provide information about its current phase in the washing cycle. The custom.dishwasherOperatingProgress will give a detailed view of the current phase, while custom.dishwasherOperatingPercentage can provide a numerical representation of how far along the cycle is. The dishwasherOperatingState can also provide context on whether it is washing, rinsing, or drying. All these capabilities are relevant to understanding the current phase of the dishwashing cycle.
